title: Got my ham license!
body:
Call sign is KD0WKW!

Good times!

73.
author: Aaron Bieber

title: Climbing wall is UP!
body:
Finally got around to finishing the climbing wall.

Man it's awesome!
author: Aaron Bieber

title: OpenBSD on the ChromeBook Pixel
body:
Attempted to install OpenBSD on my Chromebook PIXEL today. It's mostly function but wireless and X11 are a no-go.

author: Aaron Bieber

title: OpenBSD's pdksh on OSX
body:
Here is a diff to make OpenBSD's (5.3) pdksh work on OSX.

It requires homebrew, as well as bsdmake to be installed.

To Install:
  1. untar the tarball
  2. apply patch
  3. bsdmake
  4. cp ksh /bin/ksh
author: Aaron Bieber

title: Outdoor freestanding Bouldering Wall
body: Started planning / gathering all the poarts for my rock climbing wall! Hope to have it completed next week.
author: Aaron Bieber
